description: React component implementing a Settings page for managing messaging provider channels and test sending messages, interfacing with an API.

methods.name: toast(msg, isError = false)
methods.description: Helper function to display feedback messages via alert, differentiating error messages.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads messaging settings using provider-specific API if available, falling back to generic API.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the enabled state of a messaging channel, with optimistic UI update and error handling.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves the current messaging settings, attempting provider-specific update first, then fallback.

methods.name: onTestSend
methods.description: Sends a test message to a specified destination for a given channel, with validation and feedback.
